channel.title: Education on Srikar Durgam
channel.description: Recent content in Education on Srikar Durgam

item.title: Analyzing the 2019 NBA Season
item.description: library(tidyverse) library(rvest) library(ggplot2) library(lubridate) library(janitor) library(RSocrata) library(jsonlite) mydata <- read.csv('players_stats_by_season_full_details.csv') PlayersGamesPlayed <- mydata %>% filter(League == "NBA") %>% select(Player, GP) %>% group_by(Player) %>% summarise(Games_Played = sum(GP))%>% arrange(desc(Games_Played)) head(PlayersGamesPlayed,10) ## # A tibble: 10 x 2 ## Player Games_Played ## <fct> <int> ## 1 LeBron James 1504 ## 2 Vince Carter 1476 ## 3 Dirk Nowitzki 1462 ## 4 Jason Terry 1445 ## 5 Tim Duncan 1424 ## 6 Tony Parker 1424 ## 7 Joe Johnson 1388 ## 8 Paul Pierce 1320 ## 9 Kyle Korver 1311 ## 10 Andre Miller 1270
